{"id":1268555413,"question_id":36,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1716731123,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1268555413/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Sudoku","memory":"22.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isValidSudoku(vector<vector<char>>& board) {\n        vector<bool> row(10,false),column(10,false);\n        vector<vector<bool>> subGrid(9,vector<bool>(10,false));\n        int gridNum ;\n        for(int i = 0 ; i < 9; ++i){\n            for(int j = 0 ; j < 9 ; ++j){\n                if(board[i][j] <= '9' && board[j][i] <= '9' ){\n                    if(board[i][j] !=  '.' ){\n                        if(row[int(board[i][j] - '0')]){\n                            return false;\n                        }else{\n                            row[int(board[i][j] - '0')] = true;\n                        }\n                        gridNum = (i/3) * 3 + (j/3);\n                        if(subGrid[gridNum][int(board[i][j] - '0')]){\n                            return false;\n                        }else{\n                            subGrid[gridNum][int(board[i][j] - '0')] = true;\n                        }\n\n                    }\n                        \n                    if(board[j][i] != '.' ) \n                    { \n                        if(column[int(board[j][i] - '0')]){\n                            return false;\n                        }else{\n                            column[int(board[j][i] - '0')] = true;\n                        }\n                    }\n                    \n                }else {\n                    return false;\n                }\n            }\n            cout<<endl;\n            row.assign(10,false);\n            column.assign(10,false);\n        }\n        return true;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-sudoku","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
